column4: He can not have been working .
John tried to be a good boy .
Felicia kicked the ball off the bench .
The farmer loaded the cart with apples .
I mixed the sugar into the butter .
The earth was believed to be round .
Carmen bought Mary a dress .
Linda taped the picture to the wall .
John regards Bill as a good friend .
Ann may spend her vacation in Italy .
They chased the man with the car .
John became deadly afraid of flying .
I will fix the computer for Carol .
Anson believed himself to be handsome .
John put old books in the box .
Mike talked about politics yesterday to my friends .
John tries to leave the country .
This week will be a difficult one for us .
John regretted it that Bill had a good time .
I want to try and buy some whiskey .
